category.name: EA Gateway
category.category_description: Preferences for the Teamcenter Gateway for Enterprise Applications (T4EA)

preference.name: T4EA.UI.PromptEaConnectionData.Attributes
preference.preference_description: Fields of the T4EA Login dialog. Note that there a three predefined IDs: 1) Identifier (Field that displays the ID of the connection.) 2) User (Field to type in the user name) 3) Password ()Field to type in the password. The characters typed in here are not echoed in clear text and the content will not appear in the log files.) The attributes will appear in the login dialog with default labels which are derived from the IDs.
